dict.acceptation: （牛）颈部到肩部的肉；咕咕（呼鸡声），砸砸（呼马声）；抛出；亲爱的；
[机械工程]用卡盘夹紧；（口语）抛出，扔出；咕咕（咯咯、嘟嘟）地叫；（美国）辞职；

sent.orig: Chuck also witnessed this from a balcony.
sent.trans: Chuck在阳台了目睹了这一幕。

sent.orig: Q13 What year did Chuck meet Bryce?
If it's Chuck, it's not okay.
Chuck and Alice are living from hand to mouth since Chuck lost his job.
sent.trans: 自从杰克失业后，查克和爱丽丝过着拮据的生活。
